title: Glider Ducted-Fan Drone
description: A custom-designed UAV combining the efficient glide of a fixed-wing aircraft with the vertical takeoff and landing (VTOL) capabilities of a quadcopter, powered by a single ducted fan.
outcome: Successful design and prototype of a unique hybrid UAV platform, demonstrating innovative solutions to VTOL and forward-flight propulsion challenges.

title: 5" Propeller Quadcopter
description: A fully custom-built FPV racing quadcopter. Designed and assembled from the frame up, featuring custom motor mounts, a meticulously wired power distribution board, and tuned flight controllers for optimal performance.
outcome: A high-performance, reliable racing drone capable of precise acrobatic maneuvers, showcasing end-to-end hardware integration and troubleshooting skills.

title: High-Performance Fan CAD Model
description: A detailed and fully constrained parametric assembly model of a complex centrifugal fan, created to analyze assembly procedures and ensure manufacturability.
outcome: A professional-grade model that demonstrates mastery of mechanical design software and best practices for creating production-ready technical documentation.
